column2: 2015 bryan keith green died at home monday
column4: 2015. he was 53. born in san diego ca
column5: he was the son of the late charles and bobbie mae green. he was a self-employed massage therapist in the area for many years. he was a member of king hirams masonic lodge. he is survived by a sister
column11: many friends. a memorial gathering will be held from 3:00 4:00 pm
column13: june 17th at the grand central restaurant
column15: provincetown. gately mc. houl funeral home94 harry kemp way provincetown
